products.title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max (Blue Titanium)
products.description: The Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max (256 GB) in Blue Titanium features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display and A17 Bionic chip for top-tier performance. Its advanced camera system and sleek design make it perfect for capturing and storing stunning photos and videos.

products.title: OPPO F27 Pro+ 5G (Midnight Navy)
products.description: The device features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a MediaTek Dimensity 7050 processor. It also boasts a 64 MP dual rear camera, 5000 mAh battery with 67W fast charging, and an IP69 waterproof Cosmos Ring design.

products.title: Apple iPhone 15 (128GB, Black)
products.description: Display: 6.1 inches (15.54 cm), Super Retina XDR Display,Memory: 128GB ROM,Processor: Apple A16 Bionic Chip, Hexa Core,Camera: 48 MP + 12 MP Dual Rear & 12 MP Front Camera,Battery: 15W MagSafe Wireless Charging,USP: Dynamic Island, IP68 Water Resistan.

products.title: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max (512GB, Gold)
products.description: The iPhone 14 Pro Max: A flagship smartphone offering advanced camera capabilities, powerful performance, and a stunning design with a large display.

products.title: Apple iPhone 13 (128GB, Pink)
products.description: The Apple iPhone 13 (128GB, Pink): A sleek and powerful smartphone featuring a vibrant display and impressive camera system, ideal for capturing and enjoying moments in style.

products.title: SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G ( Titanium Violet)
products.description: A cutting-edge smartphone with a powerful camera array, expansive storage, and robust performance capabilities, designed for seamless multitasking and high-quality media experiences.

products.title: SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Plus 5G
products.description: The SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Plus 5G (12GB RAM, 256GB,Cobalt Violet): A premium smartphone blending sleek design with powerful performance, featuring versatile camera options and ample storage for seamless daily use and multimedia enjoyment.

products.title: Nothing Phone 2a 5G (8GB RAM, 128GB, White)
products.description: The Nothing Phone 2a 5G (8GB RAM, 128GB, White): A minimalist yet high-performance smartphone offering clean design aesthetics, solid specifications, and 5G connectivity for modern digital experiences in a compact package.

products.title: Nothing Phone 2 5G (12GB RAM, 256GB, Dark Grey)
products.description: The Nothing Phone 2 5G (12GB RAM, 256GB, Dark Grey): A sleek and powerful smartphone embodying minimalist design philosophy, with robust performance, ample storage, and 5G connectivity for a seamless digital experience.

products.title: OnePlus Nord CE4 5G (8GB RAM, 256GB, Marble)
products.description: The OnePlus Nord CE 4 5G (8GB RAM, 256GB, Marble): A stylish and feature-rich smartphone offering smooth performance, generous storage, and 5G capability, ideal for those seeking a blend of affordability and performance in a sleek package.
